name: Sweet Party Mix
author: BOBBI POTE
summary: This is a great snack mix. Wherever I bring this, I am asked for the recipe. You can't stop eating it!
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package crispy corn and rice cereal
directions: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Lightly grease a large roasting pan
In a large bowl, mix crispy corn and rice cereal, slivered almonds and toasted, chopped pecans
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter and mix with dark corn syrup and light brown sugar
Pour the mixture over the crispy corn and rice cereal mixture
Stir and shake to coat all the nuts and cereal
Pour the coated mixture into the prepared roasting pan
Stirring approximately every 15 minutes, cook 1 hour in the preheated oven
Cool on wax paper, and store in airtight containers
